body.p: A container for the columns of a template.XULElem("listbox"), each of which are created with the template.XULElem("listcol") element. There should be only one listcols element in a list box. If there is no listcols element, the list box has a single column.
body.pre: <!-- Creates a two column listbox --> <listbox> <listcols> <listcol flex="1"/> <listcol flex="1"/> </listcols> <listitem> <listcell label="Buck"/> <listcell label="Rogers"/> </listitem> <listitem> <listcell label="John"/> <listcell label="Painter"/> </listitem> </listbox>

dl.dd: template.XULElem("listbox"), template.XULElem("listcell"), template.XULElem("listcol"), template.XULElem("listhead"), template.XULElem("listheader"), template.XULElem("listitem")
